metadata.titleEn: HiWATER: Simultaneous observation dataset of land surface temperature in the middle reaches of the Heihe River Basin
metadata.titleCn: 黑河生态水文遥感试验：黑河流域中游地表温度同步观测数据集
metadata.description:
The aim of the simultaneous observation of land surface temperature is obtaining the land surface temperature of different kinds of underlying surface, including greenhouse film, the roof, road, ditch, concrete floor and so on, while the sensor of thermal infrared go into the experimental areas of artificial oases eco-hydrology on the middle stream. All the land surface temperature data will be used for validation of the retrieved land surface temperature from thermal infrared sensor and the analysis of the scale effect of the land surface temperature, and finally serve for the validation of the plausibility checks of the surface temperature product from remote sensing.
1. Observation time and other details
On 25 June, 2012, ditch and asphalt road surface temperatures were observed once every five minutes using handheld infrared thermometers recorded.
On 26 June, 2012, ditch and asphalt road surface temperatures were observed once every five minutes using handheld infrared thermometers while greenhouse film and concrete floor surface temperatures were observed once every one second using self-recording point thermometer.
On 29 June, 2012, concrete floor surface temperatures were observed continuously using handheld infrared thermometers during the sensor of TASI go into the region. At the same time, greenhouse film and concrete floor surface temperatures were observed once every one second using self-recording point thermometer.
On 30 June, 2012, asphalt road, ditch, bare soil, melonry and ridge of field surface temperatures were observed continuously using handheld infrared thermometers during the sensor of TASI go into the region. At the same time, greenhouse film and concrete floor surface temperatures were observed once every one second using self-recording point thermometer.
On 10 July, 2012, asphalt road, ditch, bare soil, melonry and ridge of field surface temperatures were observed once every one minute using handheld infrared thermometers during the sensor of TASI go into the region. At the same time, concrete floor surface temperatures were observed once every six second using self-recording point thermometer.
On 26 July, 2012, asphalt road, concrete floor, bare soil and melonry surface temperatures were observed once every one minute using handheld infrared thermometers during the sensor of WiDAS go into the region. At the same time, greenhouse film and concrete floor surface temperatures were observed once every six second using self-recording point thermometer.
On 2 August, 2012, corn field and concrete floor surface temperatures were observed using handheld infrared thermometers. At the same time, greenhouse film and concrete floor surface temperatures were observed once every six second using self-recording point thermometer. For corn field, twelve sites were selected according to the flight strip of the WiDAS sensor, and for each site one plot surface temperatures were recorded continuously during the sensor of WiDAS go into the region.
On 3 August, 2012, corn field and concrete floor surface temperatures were observed using handheld infrared thermometers. At the same time, greenhouse film and concrete floor surface temperatures were observed once every six second using self-recording point thermometer. For corn field, fourteen sites were selected according to the flight strip of the WiDAS sensor, and for each site three plots surface temperatures were recorded continuously during the sensor of WiDAS go into the region.
2. Instrument parameters and calibration
The field of view of the self-recording point thermometer and the handheld infrared thermometer are 10 and 1 degree, respectively. The emissivity of the latter was assumed to be 0.95. The observation heights of the self-recording point thermometer for the greenhouse film and the concrete floor were 0.5 m and 1 m, respectively. All instruments were calibrated three times (on 6 July, 5 August and 20 September, 2012) using black body during observation.
3. Data storage
All the observation data were stored in excel.
metadata.descriptionCn:
中游人工绿洲生态水文实验区地表温度同步观测的目的在于获取不同地表特征的日变化温度数据和热红外传感器飞行期间大棚薄膜、屋顶、道路、沟渠、水泥地等下垫面的同步地表温度，用于支持航空飞行TASI资料反演地表温度的验证和尺度效应分析。
1、观测时间、内容以及观测方式
2012年6月25日：沟渠和沥青公路使用手持式红外温度计进行观测，观测频率为5min一次。
2012年6月26日：沟渠和沥青公路使用手持式红外温度计进行观测，观测频率为5min一次；大棚薄膜和水泥地使用固定自记点温计进行观测，观测频率为1s一次。
2012年6月29日：水泥地使用手持式红外温度计进行观测，在TASI传感器进入观测上空时进行连续观测；大棚薄膜和水泥地使用固定自记点温计进行观测，观测频率为1s一次。
2012年6月30日：沥青公路、沟渠、裸土、西瓜地和田埂使用手持式红外温度计进行观测，TASI传感器进入观测上空时进行连续观测，其他时间每5min观测一次；大棚薄膜和水泥地使用固定自记点温计进行观测，观测频率为1s一次。
2012年7月10日：沥青公路、沟渠、裸土、西瓜地和田埂使用手持式红外温度计进行观测，TASI传感器进入观测上空每1min观测一次，其他时间每5min观测一次；水泥地使用固定自记点温计进行观测，观测频率为6s一次。
2012年7月26日：沥青公路、水泥地、裸土和西瓜地使用手持式红外温度计进行观测，WiDAS传感器进入观测上空进行连续观测，其他时间每5min观测一次；水泥地和大棚薄膜使用固定自记点温计进行观测，观测频率为6s一次。
2012年8月2日：玉米地和水泥地使用手持式红外温度计进行观测，其中玉米地观测根据WiDAS飞行的航带选择观测点，共选取了12个航带，每个航带下选择一个观测点在WiDAS传感器进入观测上空进行连续观测；水泥地和大棚薄膜使用固定自记点温计进行观测，观测频率为6s一次。
2012年8月3日：玉米地和水泥地使用手持式红外温度计进行观测，其中玉米地观测根据WiDAS飞行的航带选择观测点，共选取了14个航带，每个航带下选择3个观测点在WiDAS传感器进入观测上空进行连续观测；水泥地和大棚薄膜使用固定自记点温计进行观测，观测频率为6s一次。
2、观测仪器参数及标定
固定自记点温计的视场角约10°， 塑料薄膜架设高度约0.5m，水泥地面的架设高度约1m，均采用垂直观测；手持式红外温度计视场角为1°，观测比辐射率设为0.95。所有观测仪器在使用过程中分别于2012年7月6、2012年8月5和2012年9月20进行了3次标定。
3、数据的存储
所有观测数据均用Excel格式存储。

background: Upscaling of eco-hydrological processes on a heterogeneous surface is a grand challenge. Progress in this field is hindered by the poor availability of multiscale observations. HiWATER is an experiment designed to address this challenge through instrumentation on hierarchically nested scales to obtain multiscale and multidisciplinary data.
challenges: Progress in this field is hindered by the poor availability of multiscale observations.
methods: Several intensive observation periods (IOPs) and continuous hydrometeorological observations were carried out during HiWATER. Only data collected during the IOP in 2012 are presented in this paper. Instruments for the oasis-desert system were arranged in hierarchically nested scales to capture multi-scale eco-hydrological processes. We established a sparse network to investigate the oasis-desert interaction. One superstation was constructed within the oasis, and four EC towers and four two-layer automatic meteorological stations (AMSs) were installed in different landscapes surrounding the oasis, including sandy desert, desert pavement, desert steppe, and wetland. Intensive observations were implemented at the irrigation district scale. A total of 12 airborne remote sensing missions were conducted to cover the FEA using LiDAR, an imaging spectrometer, a multi-angle thermal imager, and an L-band microwave radiometer.
dataset: We introduce a multiscale dataset obtained from Heihe Watershed Allied Telemetry Experimental Research (HiWATER) in an oasis-desert area in 2012. The HiWATER observation system consists of a flux observation matrix of eddy covariance towers, large aperture scintillometers, and automatic meteorological stations; an eco-hydrological sensor network of soil moisture and leaf area index; hyper-resolution airborne remote sensing using LiDAR, imaging spectrometer, multi-angle thermal imager, and L-band microwave radiometer; and synchronical ground measurements of vegetation dynamics and photosynthesis processes. All observational data were carefully quality controlled throughout sensor calibration, data collection, data processing, and datasets generation. The data are freely available at figshare and the Cold and Arid Regions Science Data Centre.
backgroundCn: 生态水文过程在异质表面上的放大是一个重大挑战。该领域的进展受到多尺度观测数据稀缺的制约。HiWATER实验旨在通过在分层嵌套尺度上进行仪器布置，以获取多尺度和多学科的数据，从而应对这一挑战。
challengesCn: 该领域的进展受到多尺度观测稀缺的阻碍。
methodsCn: 在HiWATER期间进行了几次强烈观测期（IOPs）和连续的水文气象观测。本文仅展示了2012年IOP期间收集的数据。为捕捉多尺度生态水文过程，绿洲-沙漠系统的仪器按照层次嵌套的尺度进行布置。我们建立了一个稀疏网络，以研究绿洲-沙漠的相互作用。在绿洲内建造了一个超级站，并在绿洲周围不同的景观中安装了四个涡度协方差（EC）塔和四个两层自动气象站（AMS），这些景观包括沙漠、沙漠铺装、沙漠草原和湿地。在灌溉区尺度上实施了强烈观测。共进行了12次空中遥感任务，使用了激光雷达、成像光谱仪、多角度热成像仪和L波段微波辐射计覆盖了FEA。
datasetCn: 我们介绍了一个多尺度数据集，该数据集来自2012年在绿洲-沙漠地区进行的黑河流域联合遥测实验研究（HiWATER）。HiWATER观测系统由涡度协方差塔、大孔径闪烁仪和自动气象站组成的通量观测矩阵；土壤湿度和叶面积指数的生态水文传感器网络；使用激光雷达、成像光谱仪、多角度热成像仪和L波段微波辐射计的超高分辨率航空遥感；以及同步的植被动态和光合作用过程的地面测量。所有观测数据在传感器校准、数据收集、数据处理和数据集生成过程中都经过了严格的质量控制。这些数据可在figshare和寒区与干旱区科学数据中心免费获取。

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Are the challenges in obtaining multiscale observations in eco-hydrological studies mainly due to instrumentation limitations, data processing complexities, or poor availability of multiscale observations?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 在生态水文研究中，获取多尺度观测的挑战主要是由于仪器限制、数据处理复杂性还是多尺度观测的可用性差？
Disjunctive.AnswerCn: 多尺度观测的可用性差。

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What are the primary data collection methods used to observe surface temperature variations in heterogeneous landscapes?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 观察异质景观表面温度变化的主要数据收集方法有哪些？
Concept Completion.AnswerEn: handheld infrared thermometers, fixed automatic temperature recorders
Concept Completion.AnswerCn: 手持式红外线温度计，固定自动温度记录仪

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: When were the calibration processes for the observational instruments conducted during the data collection phase?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在数据收集阶段，观测仪器的校准过程是在什么时候进行的？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Where can datasets related to eco-hydrological processes from hierarchical scales be accessed?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 可以在哪里访问与层次尺度的生态水文过程相关的数据集？
Concept Completion.AnswerEn: figshare, Cold and Arid Regions Science Data Centre

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to acquire multiscale eco-hydrological observations in a heterogeneous surface environment?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个数据收集方法的例子，用于在异质表面环境中获取多尺度生态水文观测？
Example.AnswerEn: The HiWATER experiment utilized instrumentation on hierarchically nested scales, including a sparse network to investigate oasis-desert interactions, and a superstation within the oasis. This method enabled the capture of multiscale eco-hydrological processes through a combination of eddy covariance towers, large aperture scintillometers, automatic meteorological stations, and airborne remote sensing missions.
Example.AnswerCn: HiWATER实验利用了分层嵌套尺度的仪器，包括一个稀疏网络来研究绿洲-沙漠相互作用，以及一个位于绿洲内的超级站。这种方法通过结合涡度协方差塔、大孔径闪烁仪、自动气象站和空中遥感任务，捕捉了多尺度生态水文过程。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced in collecting and utilizing multiscale environmental data for eco-hydrological research?
Example.QuestionCn: 在收集和利用多尺度环境数据进行生态水文学研究时面临的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: A significant challenge in collecting multiscale environmental data is the poor availability of multiscale observations, which hinders progress in understanding eco-hydrological processes. HiWATER aimed to address this challenge by conducting intensive observation periods and continuous observations with a comprehensive setup of various instruments.
Example.AnswerCn: 收集多尺度环境数据的一大挑战是多尺度观测的可用性差，这阻碍了对生态水文过程的理解。HiWATER旨在通过进行密集观测期和持续观测，利用各种仪器的综合设置来解决这一挑战。

Example.QuestionEn: Can you give an example of a dataset that combines ground measurements and remote sensing data in eco-hydrological research?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个结合地面测量和遥感数据的生态水文研究数据集的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: A dataset obtained from the HiWATER experiment combines synchronical ground measurements of vegetation dynamics and photosynthesis processes with hyper-resolution airborne remote sensing data, including LiDAR, imaging spectrometer, multi-angle thermal imager, and L-band microwave radiometer, to provide a multiscale dataset for eco-hydrological research.
Example.AnswerCn: 从HiWATER实验获得的数据集结合了植被动态和光合作用过程的同步地面测量与超高分辨率的航空遥感数据，包括激光雷达、成像光谱仪、多角度热成像仪和L波段微波辐射计，为生态水文研究提供了多尺度的数据集。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of the data collection methods used for observing surface temperatures in eco-hydrological experiments?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 生态水文实验中用于观察表面温度的数据收集方法的特点是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: handheld infrared thermometers, field of view 1°, emissivity setting 0.95, intervals of 5 minutes or continuous, fixed point thermometers, field of view 10°, continuous observations, frequencies 1 second or 6 seconds
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 手持式红外测温仪，视场角1°，发射率设置为0.95，间隔5分钟或连续测量；固定点测温仪，视场角10°，连续观测，频率为1秒或6秒。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What specific attributes of eco-hydrological processes are captured by the instrumentation in multiscale datasets?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 多尺度数据集中的仪器捕捉到生态水文过程的哪些具体属性？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: flux observation matrix, eddy covariance towers, large aperture scintillometers, automatic meteorological stations, eco-hydrological sensor network for soil moisture, leaf area index, hyper-resolution airborne remote sensing, LiDAR, imaging spectrometer, multi-angle thermal imager, L-band microwave radiometer, ground measurements of vegetation dynamics, photosynthesis processes
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 通量观测矩阵，涡度相关塔，大孔径闪烁仪，自动气象站，土壤湿度生态水文传感器网络，叶面积指数，超高分辨率机载遥感，激光雷达，成像光谱仪，多角度热成像仪，L波段微波辐射计，植被动态地面测量，光合作用过程。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of the challenges faced in obtaining multiscale observations for eco-hydrological studies?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在生态水文研究中，获取多尺度观测所面临的挑战的特点是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: poor availability of multiscale observations, intensive observation periods, continuous hydrometeorological observations, hierarchically nested scales
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 多尺度观测的可用性差、强化观测期、连续水文气象观测、分层嵌套尺度。

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the frequency of temperature data collection using handheld infrared thermometers during the observation period?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在观察期间，使用手持红外线温度计收集温度数据的频率是多少？

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many different landscapes were covered by the automatic meteorological stations surrounding the oasis?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 环绕绿洲的自动气象站覆盖了多少种不同的景观？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is meant by 'synchronical ground measurements' in the context of eco-hydrological data collection?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在生态水文数据收集的背景下，“同步地面测量”是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: Synchronical ground measurements refer to the simultaneous collection of data on vegetation dynamics and photosynthesis processes at the ground level, which is conducted in conjunction with other remote sensing and instrument-based observations to provide a comprehensive multi-scale dataset in the field of eco-hydrology.
Definition.AnswerCn: 同步地面测量是指在地面层面同时收集植被动态和光合作用过程的数据，这一过程与其他遥感和基于仪器的观测相结合，以提供生态水文学领域的综合多尺度数据集。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the data collection methods using handheld infrared thermometers compare to those using fixed automatic temperature loggers in terms of frequency and application?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 手持红外线温度计的数据收集方法与固定自动温度记录仪的数据收集方法在频率和应用方面有何比较？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The handheld infrared thermometers were used with varying observation frequencies, such as every 5 minutes or continuously when sensors were overhead, and were applied to various surfaces like roads and soil. In contrast, fixed automatic temperature loggers recorded data at a higher frequency, such as every 1 second or every 6 seconds, and were typically used for surfaces like plastic films and cement ground, providing more continuous data capture for specific locations.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 手持红外温度计以不同的观察频率使用，例如每5分钟一次或在传感器在上方时连续使用，并应用于各种表面，如道路和土壤。相比之下，固定自动温度记录仪以更高的频率记录数据，例如每1秒或每6秒一次，通常用于塑料薄膜和水泥地面等表面，为特定位置提供更连续的数据捕获。

Comparison.QuestionEn: In what ways do the challenges of multiscale observation availability affect the methods used for data collection in eco-hydrological research compared to those focusing solely on single-scale observations?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 多尺度观测可用性所带来的挑战如何影响生态水文学研究中的数据收集方法，与那些仅专注于单尺度观测的方法相比？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Multiscale observation challenges necessitate the use of hierarchically nested instrumentation, as seen with the HiWATER experiment utilizing diverse tools like eddy covariance towers and remote sensing technologies on various scales. This contrasts with single-scale observations, which might rely on more uniform and less diverse data collection methods. The complexity in multiscale setups aims to capture the heterogeneous nature of eco-hydrological processes, whereas single-scale methods might not address the interactions and variability as comprehensively.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 多尺度观测挑战需要使用分层嵌套的仪器，如HiWATER实验中使用的各种工具，包括涡度协方差塔和不同尺度的遥感技术。这与单尺度观测形成对比，后者可能依赖于更统一和不太多样化的数据收集方法。多尺度设置中的复杂性旨在捕捉生态水文过程的异质性，而单尺度方法可能无法全面解决相互作用和变异性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the limited availability of multiscale observations in the field of eco-hydrological processes on heterogeneous surfaces?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在生态水文过程的异质表面领域，限制多尺度观测可用性的因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The limited availability of multiscale observations is a challenge due to the complexity and diversity of eco-hydrological processes across different landscapes, which require hierarchically nested scales of instrumentation and a comprehensive network of sensors to adequately capture the interactions and dynamics involved.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 多尺度观测的有限可用性是一个挑战，因为不同景观中生态水文过程的复杂性和多样性需要分层嵌套的仪器尺度和全面的传感器网络，以充分捕捉相关的相互作用和动态。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences for the accuracy and reliability of temperature measurements when different observation frequencies and instruments are used across varied surfaces?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 当在不同的表面上使用不同的观测频率和仪器时，温度测量的准确性和可靠性可能会受到哪些潜在影响？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using different observation frequencies and instruments may affect the accuracy and reliability of temperature measurements by introducing variability in data capture. For instance, fixed self-recording thermometers and handheld infrared thermometers have different field of view angles and emissivity settings, which could lead to discrepancies in temperature readings across surfaces like roads and greenhouses. Calibration of instruments at multiple points in time ensures alignment across datasets, potentially enhancing accuracy and reliability.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用不同的观测频率和仪器可能会通过引入数据捕获的变异性来影响温度测量的准确性和可靠性。例如，固定自记录温度计和手持红外温度计具有不同的视场角和发射率设置，这可能导致在道路和温室等表面上的温度读数出现差异。在多个时间点对仪器进行校准可以确保数据集之间的一致性，从而潜在地提高准确性和可靠性。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What outcomes might arise from implementing multiscale and multidisciplinary instrumentation in observing eco-hydrological processes in heterogeneous surfaces?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在观察异质表面的生态水文过程时，实施多尺度和多学科仪器可能会产生哪些结果？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Implementing multiscale and multidisciplinary instrumentation can lead to comprehensive data capture of eco-hydrological processes, which may enhance understanding of surface interactions in heterogeneous areas. This approach, as seen in the HiWATER experiment, addresses the challenge of limited multiscale observations by using a combination of airborne remote sensing and ground-based measurements, which could improve the modeling and prediction of eco-hydrological dynamics.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 实施多尺度和多学科的仪器设备可以全面捕捉生态水文过程的数据，这可能增强对异质区域表面相互作用的理解。这种方法，如在HiWATER实验中所见，通过结合航空遥感和地面测量来解决有限多尺度观测的挑战，这可能改善生态水文动态的建模和预测。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the goal of synchronizing ground-based surface temperature observations with aerial sensor data in eco-hydrological studies?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在生态水文研究中，同步地面表面温度观测与航空传感器数据的目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The goal of synchronizing ground-based surface temperature observations with aerial sensor data is to obtain day-to-day temperature variation data for different surface characteristics and to support the validation and scale effect analysis of surface temperature retrieval from airborne TASI sensor data.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 同步地面表面温度观测与航空传感器数据的目标是获取不同表面特征的逐日温度变化数据，并支持从航空TASI传感器数据中提取表面温度的验证和尺度效应分析。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the objectives of using a hierarchically nested observation system in the oasis-desert interface?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠界面使用分层嵌套观察系统的目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The objectives of using a hierarchically nested observation system are to capture multi-scale eco-hydrological processes, investigate oasis-desert interactions, and provide a structured approach for collecting data across various scales and disciplines, thereby enhancing the understanding and modeling of these interactions.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 使用分层嵌套观测系统的目标是捕捉多尺度生态水文过程，研究绿洲-沙漠相互作用，并提供一种结构化的方法，以便在不同尺度和学科之间收集数据，从而增强对这些相互作用的理解和建模。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the specific procedures and instruments used to achieve synchronized surface temperature observations in various land cover types during remote sensing flights?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在遥感飞行中，为了在不同土地覆盖类型下实现同步的地表温度观测，使用了哪些具体程序和仪器？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Synchronized surface temperature observations were achieved using handheld infrared thermometers and fixed-point temperature recorders. The handheld infrared thermometers, with a field of view of 1° and an emissivity setting of 0.95, were used to measure temperatures on asphalt roads, ditches, bare soil, watermelon fields, and ridges with an observation frequency of every 5 minutes or continuously during sensor overflights. Fixed-point temperature recorders, with a field of view of approximately 10°, were used for observing plastic film and cement surfaces with observation frequencies ranging from 1s to 6s, depending on the specific land cover and date.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 同步的表面温度观测是通过手持红外温度计和固定点温度记录仪实现的。手持红外温度计的视场为1°，发射率设置为0.95，用于测量沥青道路、沟渠、裸土、西瓜田和山脊的温度，观测频率为每5分钟一次或在传感器飞越期间连续测量。固定点温度记录仪的视场约为10°，用于观察塑料薄膜和水泥表面，观测频率从1秒到6秒不等，具体取决于特定的土地覆盖和日期。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How were the observational instruments calibrated to ensure accurate temperature measurements during the data collection period?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在数据收集期间，观测仪器是如何校准的，以确保温度测量的准确性？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The observational instruments, including handheld infrared thermometers and fixed-point temperature recorders, were calibrated three times during the data collection period on July 6, August 5, and September 20, 2012. This calibration process was essential to ensure accurate and reliable temperature measurements across different surface types and conditions.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 观测仪器，包括手持红外温度计和固定点温度记录仪，在2012年7月6日、8月5日和9月20日的数据显示期间进行了三次校准。这个校准过程对于确保在不同表面类型和条件下的温度测量准确可靠至关重要。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What methodologies were employed to manage and store the data collected from the surface temperature observations, and how was data quality ensured?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 用于管理和存储表面温度观测数据的方法论是什么，以及如何确保数据质量？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: All observational data were stored in Excel format, which facilitated data management and analysis. Data quality was ensured through careful calibration of the observational instruments on multiple occasions throughout the study period. This process was part of a broader effort to maintain the reliability and accuracy of the collected dataset, supporting further analysis and validation of remote sensing data.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 所有观测数据都以Excel格式存储，这便于数据管理和分析。通过在研究期间多次对观测仪器进行仔细校准，确保了数据质量。这个过程是维护所收集数据集的可靠性和准确性的更广泛努力的一部分，支持了遥感数据的进一步分析和验证。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What instrumentation and calibration methods enable the accurate measurement of surface temperature in eco-hydrological research?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些仪器和校准方法能够在生态水文研究中准确测量表面温度？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The use of hand-held infrared thermometers and fixed point thermometers with specific field of view angles and emissivity settings, along with periodic calibration, enables accurate measurement of surface temperature in eco-hydrological research.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 手持红外温度计和具有特定视场角和发射率设置的固定点温度计的使用，以及定期校准，使得在生态水文研究中能够准确测量表面温度。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How does the implementation of hierarchically nested scales in an experimental setup enable the observation of multiscale eco-hydrological processes?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 在实验设置中实施分层嵌套尺度如何使观察多尺度生态水文过程成为可能？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The implementation of hierarchically nested scales using a sparse network of stations, superstations, and diverse instrumentation, such as eddy covariance towers and automatic meteorological stations, allows for the capture of multiscale eco-hydrological processes across diverse landscapes.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 通过使用稀疏的站点网络、超级站点和多样化的仪器（如涡度协方差塔和自动气象站），实施分层嵌套尺度可以捕捉到不同景观中多尺度的生态水文过程。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What data collection strategies enable the acquisition of multi-angle and hyperspectral data for remote sensing in eco-hydrological research?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些数据收集策略能够获取多角度和高光谱数据，以用于生态水文研究的遥感？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The use of airborne remote sensing missions employing LiDAR, imaging spectrometers, multi-angle thermal imagers, and L-band microwave radiometers enables the acquisition of multi-angle and hyperspectral data crucial for remote sensing in eco-hydrological research.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 使用搭载激光雷达、成像光谱仪、多角度热成像仪和L波段微波辐射计的空中遥感任务，可以获取对生态水文研究至关重要的多角度和高光谱数据。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might there be challenges in obtaining multiscale observations in eco-hydrological studies of heterogeneous surfaces?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在生态水文研究中，获取异质表面的多尺度观测可能面临哪些挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Challenges in obtaining multiscale observations in eco-hydrological studies are due to the poor availability of multiscale observations, which is a significant hurdle in upscaling eco-hydrological processes on heterogeneous surfaces.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 在生态水文研究中，获得多尺度观测的挑战主要是由于多尺度观测的可用性差，这在对异质表面进行生态水文过程的上尺度处理时是一个重大障碍。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What is your evaluation of the methodology used in collecting multiscale eco-hydrological data in oasis-desert areas?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 我对在绿洲-沙漠地区收集多尺度生态水文数据的方法论的评估是什么？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The methodology employed for collecting multiscale eco-hydrological data in oasis-desert areas involves a sophisticated system of hierarchically nested scales, capturing diverse processes through a combination of fixed and mobile instrumentation. This approach seems well-suited for addressing the challenges of data scarcity in heterogeneous surfaces but requires rigorous calibration and quality control to ensure data reliability.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 在绿洲-沙漠地区收集多尺度生态水文数据的方法论涉及一个复杂的分层嵌套尺度系统，通过固定和移动仪器的组合捕捉多样的过程。这种方法似乎非常适合解决异质表面数据稀缺的挑战，但需要严格的校准和质量控制，以确保数据的可靠性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how different data collection methods can be synchronized efficiently to capture multiscale eco-hydrological processes.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白如何有效地同步不同的数据收集方法，以捕捉多尺度生态水文过程。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Data collection methods can be synchronized by using a hierarchically nested scale approach, which includes arranging instruments like EC towers and automatic meteorological stations in strategic locations, as well as implementing intensive observations at specific intervals, such as during intensive observation periods (IOPs).
Assertion.AnswerCn: 数据收集方法可以通过使用分层嵌套尺度的方法进行同步，这包括将如涡度协方差塔和自动气象站等仪器安排在战略位置，以及在特定时间间隔内实施密集观测，例如在密集观测期（IOPs）期间。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm unsure about the challenges that arise from poor availability of multiscale observations in eco-hydrology research.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我对生态水文学研究中多尺度观测可用性差所带来的挑战感到不确定。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The challenges include difficulty in upscaling eco-hydrological processes on heterogeneous surfaces and limited progress in understanding these processes due to the lack of comprehensive multiscale data.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 挑战包括在异质表面上放大生态水文过程的困难，以及由于缺乏全面的多尺度数据，导致对这些过程的理解进展有限。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of how datasets from eco-hydrological experiments are quality controlled and made freely accessible.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解生态水文实验的数据集是如何进行质量控制并免费提供的。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Datasets are quality controlled through steps such as sensor calibration, data collection, data processing, and generation of datasets. They are then made freely available on platforms like figshare and the Cold and Arid Regions Science Data Centre.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 数据集通过传感器校准、数据收集、数据处理和数据集生成等步骤进行质量控制。然后，它们被免费提供在如figshare和寒冷与干旱地区科学数据中心等平台上。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore the methodologies used for synchronizing ground-based surface temperature observations with airborne thermal infrared sensor data in eco-hydrological studies.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探讨在生态水文研究中，用于将地面表面温度观测与空中热红外传感器数据同步的方法。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: In the given field, ground-based surface temperature observations were synchronized with airborne thermal infrared sensor data by using handheld infrared thermometers and fixed-point thermometers. Observations were conducted at specific intervals and synchronized with sensor overflights to validate and analyze the surface temperature data and its scale effects.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 在给定领域，地面表面温度观测与空中热红外传感器数据通过使用手持红外温度计和固定点温度计进行了同步。观测在特定间隔内进行，并与传感器飞越同步，以验证和分析表面温度数据及其尺度效应。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please identify the challenges associated with obtaining multiscale eco-hydrological data in heterogeneous landscapes and suggest potential strategies to overcome these challenges.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请识别在异质景观中获取多尺度生态水文数据所面临的挑战，并建议克服这些挑战的潜在策略。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Challenges in obtaining multiscale eco-hydrological data include the poor availability of multiscale observations and capturing processes on heterogeneous surfaces. Strategies used included arranging instruments on hierarchically nested scales, implementing sparse networks, and utilizing a combination of ground measurements and airborne remote sensing missions to cover diverse landscapes and processes.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 获取多尺度生态水文数据的挑战包括多尺度观测的可用性差以及在异质表面上捕捉过程的困难。采用的策略包括在分层嵌套尺度上布置仪器、实施稀疏网络，以及利用地面测量和空中遥感任务的结合，以覆盖多样的景观和过程。
